item.title: My Unofficial Study Guide for the Certified Technical Architect
item.description:
My Unofficial Study Guide for the Certified Technical Architect

For more background on the whole process of CTA check out my lengthy post. Prerequisites - DEV401 or equivalent - DEV501 or equivalent - ADM201 or equivalent - ADM301 or equivalent - Sales Cloud Consultant Certification or equivalent - Service Cloud Consultant Certification or equivalent - Technical Architect Study Guide material - Enterprise Technical Architecture - especially...

item.title: Retrospective Debugger: Work in Progress
item.description:
Retrospective Debugger: Work in Progress

The Welkin Suite is proud to announce that a handy debugging tool will soon be featured in our IDE! With a load of useful functions available without having to switch to external apps, the Retrospective Debugger will bring bugfixing in your code to a new level.

item.title: The Value of CRM Isn't In the Product, It's How You Use It
item.description:
The Value of CRM Isn't In the Product, It's How You Use It

A customer relationship management (CRM) system can give you insights about your business you never imagined. It can help you forecast more accurately and earlier than ever before - and scale tall buildings in a single bound. You get my point. CRM has the potential to be an organizational game
